title: I cant play fizz with locked camera
body: with camera locked fizzes ultimate move cannot be extended to the max range at the max camera zoom for probably around 70% of the directions.  Whats worse, the moves range is crippled in those areas to like 2 or 3 percent, effectively making him unplayable in many situations with locked camera.   This made me so mad I quit for a while, a few months as fizz is the champion I want to play the most.  Am I missing some thing here?  Is there a way to extend the camera out more that I am not realizing?  I really hate playing with unlocked camera...

replies.body: I've never heard of this before. Are you using a specific mouse/mouse software when this happens? Can you grab an in-game screenshot with the F12 key and grab it from the screenshot folder **(c:\riot games\League Of Legends\screenshots)** and upload it to [**Imgur**](https://imgur.com/) before linking me? I'd like to see this happening so I can figure out what's going on. I'd recommend a custom match in ARAM to get a screenshot fairly quickly without having to play a full game. ^.^
I may have exaggerated a bit but i was a lil salty heh but check it out and thanks http://imgur.com/gallery/RPfsH

Just to confirm this isn't caused by any program running in the background, I'd like you to [**perform a clean boot of windows**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752684-Low-Frame-Rate-FPS-Troubleshooting#wq3) before testing this out again in a custom match.

Fingers crossed that this was the trick!
so your saying that the camera should be able to zoom out further or the range should be smaller ?
The camera zoom from the screenshot is normal based on what I've seen on other PCs zoomed all the way out. Did that clean boot cause any sort of change?
im still trying to find out from you if this is normal or if it is a glitch like if you get on lol and play fizz is it the same for you like in my screenshot  or is it different?

My bad for not directly stating it, the amount of zoom in your screenshot looks normal to me. I spoke with some of our game specialists and it seems that you may want to try *Quick Cast* (In Hotkey Settings) while using a locked-camera, otherwise you may have to play without a locked camera in order to make full use of Fizz's ult.

Let me know if you have any other questions.
its fine thanks for the help
okay I will do that asap
